## Functions

### adjustedSumFreq() {#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BlockFrequency adjustedSumFreq (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; BBs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return adjusted total frequency of <code>BBs</code>.

<ul>
<li>If there is only one BB, sinking instruction will not introduce code size increase. Thus there is no need to adjust the frequency.</li>
<li>If there are more than one BB, sinking would lead to code size increase. In this case, we add some &quot;tax&quot; to the total frequency to make it harder to sink. E.g. Freq(Preheader) = 100 Freq(BBs) = sum(50, 49) = 99 Even if Freq(BBs) &lt; Freq(Preheader), we will not sink from Preheade to BBs as the difference is too small to justify the code size increase. To model this, The adjusted Freq(BBs) will be: AdjustedFreq(BBs) = 99 / SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold%</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopsink-cpp">LoopSink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findBBsToSinkInto() {#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SmallPtrSet&lt; BasicBlock &#42;, 2 &gt; findBBsToSinkInto (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; UseBBs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; ColdLoopBBs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp; DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a set of basic blocks to insert sinked instructions.

The returned set of basic blocks (BBsToSinkInto) should satisfy:


<ul>
<li>Inside the loop <code>L</code></li>
<li>For each UseBB in <code>UseBBs</code>, there is at least one BB in BBsToSinkInto that domintates the UseBB</li>
<li>Has minimum total frequency that is no greater than preheader frequency</li>
</ul>


The purpose of the function is to find the optimal sinking points to minimize execution cost, which is defined as &quot;sum of frequency of
BBsToSinkInto&quot;. As a result, the returned BBsToSinkInto needs to have minimum total frequency. Additionally, if the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto exceeds preheader frequency, the optimal solution is not sinking (return empty set).

<code>ColdLoopBBs</code> is used to help find the optimal sinking locations. It stores a list of BBs that is:


<ul>
<li>Inside the loop <code>L</code></li>
<li>Has a frequency no larger than the loop&#39;s preheader</li>
<li>Sorted by BB frequency</li>
</ul>


The complexity of the function is O(UseBBs.size() &#42; ColdLoopBBs.size()). To avoid expensive computation, we cap the maximum UseBBs.size() in its caller.

Definition at line <a href="#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopsink-cpp">LoopSink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- LoopSink.cpp - Loop Sink Pass -------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass does the inverse transformation of what LICM does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It traverses all of the instructions in the loop&#39;s preheader and sinks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them to the loop body where frequency is lower than the loop&#39;s preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is a reverse-transformation of LICM. It differs from the Sink</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass in the following ways:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; It only handles sinking of instructions from the loop&#39;s preheader to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   loop&#39;s body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; It uses alias set tracker to get more accurate alias info</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; It uses block frequency info to find the optimal sinking locations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Overall algorithm:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For I in Preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   InsertBBs = BBs that uses I</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   For BB in sorted(LoopBBs):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     DomBBs = BBs in InsertBBs that are dominated by BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     if freq(DomBBs) &gt; freq(BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       InsertBBs = UseBBs - DomBBs + BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   For BB in InsertBBs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Insert I at BB&#39;s beginning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopsink-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar/LoopSink.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/scalar-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2">SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;sink-freq-percent-threshold&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(90),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;execute less than this percent of the time.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="#ae32df5d3058e3f6d41b013da96a14a6c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#ae32df5d3058e3f6d41b013da96a14a6c">MaxNumberOfUseBBsForSinking</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;max-uses-for-sinking&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(30),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Do not sink instructions that have too many uses.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return adjusted total frequency of \\p BBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; If there is only one BB, sinking instruction will not introduce code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   size increase. Thus there is no need to adjust the frequency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; If there are more than one BB, sinking would lead to code size increase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   In this case, we add some &quot;tax&quot; to the total frequency to make it harder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   to sink. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     Freq(Preheader) = 100</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     Freq(BBs) = sum(50, 49) = 99</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Even if Freq(BBs) &lt; Freq(Preheader), we will not sink from Preheade to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   BBs as the difference is too small to justify the code size increase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   To model this, The adjusted Freq(BBs) will be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     AdjustedFreq(BBs) = 99 / SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold%</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;BBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;BFI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : BBs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> += BFI.getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> /= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(<a href="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2">SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold</a>, 100);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return a set of basic blocks to insert sinked instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The returned set of basic blocks (BBsToSinkInto) should satisfy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; Inside the loop \\p L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; For each UseBB in \\p UseBBs, there is at least one BB in BBsToSinkInto</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   that domintates the UseBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; Has minimum total frequency that is no greater than preheader frequency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The purpose of the function is to find the optimal sinking points to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// minimize execution cost, which is defined as &quot;sum of frequency of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BBsToSinkInto&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// As a result, the returned BBsToSinkInto needs to have minimum total</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// frequency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Additionally, if the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto exceeds preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// frequency, the optimal solution is not sinking (return empty set).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p ColdLoopBBs is used to help find the optimal sinking locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It stores a list of BBs that is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; Inside the loop \\p L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; Has a frequency no larger than the loop&#39;s preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; Sorted by BB frequency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The complexity of the function is O(UseBBs.size() &#42; ColdLoopBBs.size()).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To avoid expensive computation, we cap the maximum UseBBs.size() in its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477">findBBsToSinkInto</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;UseBBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;ColdLoopBBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;BFI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> BBsToSinkInto;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBsToSinkInto;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>(), UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a7004354fbee1c8cd74ed9001915e1db5">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> BBsDominatedByColdestBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every iteration:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Pick the ColdestBB from ColdLoopBBs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Find the set BBsDominatedByColdestBB that satisfy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - BBsDominatedByColdestBB is a subset of BBsToSinkInto</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - Every BB in BBsDominatedByColdestBB is dominated by ColdestBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; If Freq(ColdestBB) &lt; Freq(BBsDominatedByColdestBB), remove</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     BBsDominatedByColdestBB from BBsToSinkInto, add ColdestBB to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     BBsToSinkInto</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ColdestBB : ColdLoopBBs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SinkedBB : BBsToSinkInto)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(ColdestBB, SinkedBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(SinkedBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsDominatedByColdestBB, BFI) &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BFI.getBlockFreq(ColdestBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DominatedBB : BBsDominatedByColdestBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBsToSinkInto.erase(DominatedBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BBsToSinkInto.insert(ColdestBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, see if we can stop the search through the cold BBs early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the ColdLoopBBs list is sorted in increasing magnitude of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frequency the cold BB frequencies can only get larger. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BBsToSinkInto set can only get smaller and have a smaller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjustedSumFreq, due to the earlier checking. So once we find a cold BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a frequency at least as large as the adjustedSumFreq of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current BBsToSinkInto set, the earlier frequency check can never be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true for a future iteration. Note we could do check this more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aggressively earlier, but in practice this ended up being more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expensive overall (added checking to the critical path through the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that often ended up continuing early due to an empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BBsDominatedByColdestBB set, and the frequency check there was false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// most of the time anyway).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsToSinkInto, BFI) &lt;= BFI.getBlockFreq(ColdestBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t sink into blocks that have no valid insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : BBsToSinkInto) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt() == BB-&gt;end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto is larger than preheader frequency,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do not sink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsToSinkInto, BFI) &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BFI.getBlockFreq(L.getLoopPreheader()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBsToSinkInto;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sinks \\p I from the loop \\p L&#39;s preheader to its uses. Returns true if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sinking is successful.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\p LoopBlockNumber is used to sort the insertion blocks to ensure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determinism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="#a89374dd34ed723e45309afa9ac10eb83"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a89374dd34ed723e45309afa9ac10eb83">sinkInstruction</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;BFI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater">MemorySSAUpdater</a> &#42;MSSAU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the set of blocks in loop L which contain a use of I.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> BBs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.uses()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot sink I if it has uses outside of the loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Enable LoopSink only when runtime profile is available.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to do a postorder walk over the loops. Since loops are a tree this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is equivalent to a reversed preorder walk and preorder is easy to compute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without recursion. Since we reverse the preorder, we will visit siblings</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in reverse program order. This isn&#39;t expected to matter at all but is more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consistent with sinking algorithms which generally work bottom-up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Loop &#42;, 4&gt;</a> PreorderLoops = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0">getLoopsInPreorder</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Preheader = L.getLoopPreheader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Preheader)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we don&#39;t pass SCEV here because it is only used to invalidate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loops in SCEV and we don&#39;t preserve (or request) SCEV at all making that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;ScalarEvolution&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PreorderLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
